8.11.16  7:52 am   Bill, I'm also a content creator and I totally feel you man (I think). People would constantly message me saying "Hey, I WANT you to do this!" or "Why is it taking so long?!!!" and stuff like that. I feel like I've got too much on my plate, and I end up worrying about it and end up wasting more time. It's very stressful. Or WAS. I figured out my own solution... I'll do what I f***ing what in my own f***ing time. Yeah. ...You're probably wondering what's the question after all these ramblings. There's actually none. I just wanted to tell it to someone. You don't even have to answer this. Good luck with your work. I absolutely dig all of them, even if it's 3-second long or 3000000-second long.
8.11.16  6:02 am   Are you planning to make a new longer video about some country? Love your history of japan and your approach. Thanks

8.11.16  1:35 am   I've been thinking about this... So like, since we know the numbers 0-9, technically we know all the numbers, right? (from negative infinity up to positive infinity) So since we know all the letters, why doesn't it follow that we also know all the words? Or does it?

8.11.16  1:31 am   I used to sleep with this guy occasionally, and it was great. But it became clear that he always wanted a real relationship with me, and I wanted to keep things casual, so we drifted apart. About a year has gone by. I just found out he has a girlfriend now. The problem is, I REALLY want to hook up with him again. It's all I think about all day. I think I might be able to convince him to cheat on his gf with me (since he was always really into me), but that feels wrong. I could also try to break them up by pretending like I finally DO want to date him, and then just use him for sex for a while. But that option also feels wrong. A third option might be to ask for a threesome with him and his gf, but I doubt she'd consent to a threesome with one of his former lovers, and plus I don't know if I really want to hook up with a woman anyway. What do you think I should do??
